Collaborators

pyiron benefits greatly from its broad, diverse network of collaborators and users.

✎ Manage Collaborators

Interested in testing pyiron yourself? Try it on Mybinder or install it via conda /Github.

  • Max-Planck-Institut für Eisenforschung
    Düsseldorf, Germany
  • Interdisciplinary Centre for Advanced Materials Simulation (ICAMS)
    Bochum, Germany
  • Technische Universität Darmstadt
    Darmstadt, Germany
  • Los Alamos National Laboratory
    Los Alamos, NM, USA
  • Montanuniversität Leoben
    Leoben, Austria
  • University of British Columbia
    Vancouver, Canada
  • GHENT University - Center for Molecular Modeling
    Ghent, Belgium
  • Skolkovo Institute of Science and Technology
    Moscow, Russia

Affiliated Projects

pyiron has lots of friends. These are just a few of the teams we've worked with to seamlessly integrate their state-of-the-art tools into pyiron, or vice-versa.
